Math.text: h * p = (integral _ R)@(e ^ (- x ^ 2 / 2) * e ^ (- i * p * x) * differential-d@(x))

para.p: Then we check that

Math.text: h ^ prime * p = - i * (integral _ R)@(x * e ^ (- x ^ 2 / 2) * e ^ (- i * p * x) * differential-d@(x)) = i * (integral _ R)@((d / (d * x)) * e ^ (- x ^ 2 / 2) * e ^ (- i * p * x) * differential-d@(x))

para.p: Integrating by parts yields

Math.text: Gamma * s * zeta _ A * s = ((integral _ 0) ^ infinity)@((t ^ (s - 1) * e ^ (- t) * differential-d@(t)) cdot ((sum _ (k = 1)) ^ infinity)@((lambda _ k) ^ (- s)))
Gamma * s * zeta _ A * s
absent = ((integral _ 0) ^ infinity)@((t ^ (s - 1) * e ^ (- t) * differential-d@(t)) cdot ((sum _ (k = 1)) ^ infinity)@((lambda _ k) ^ (- s)))
absent = ((sum _ (k = 1)) ^ infinity)@((lambda _ k) ^ (- s) * ((integral _ 0) ^ infinity)@(t ^ (s - 1) * e ^ (- t) * differential-d@(t)))
absent = ((sum _ (k = 1)) ^ infinity)@((lambda _ k) ^ (- s) * ((integral _ 0) ^ infinity)@(t ^ (s - 1) * e ^ (- t) * differential-d@(t)))
absent = ((sum _ (k = 1)) ^ infinity)@((lambda _ k) ^ (- s) * ((integral _ 0) ^ infinity)@((lambda _ k * u) ^ (s - 1) * e ^ (- lambda _ k * u) * lambda _ k * differential-d@(u)))
absent = ((sum _ (k = 1)) ^ infinity)@((lambda _ k) ^ (- s) * ((integral _ 0) ^ infinity)@((lambda _ k * u) ^ (s - 1) * e ^ (- lambda _ k * u) * lambda _ k * differential-d@(u)))
absent = ((sum _ (k = 1)) ^ infinity)@(((integral _ 0) ^ infinity)@(u ^ (s - 1) * e ^ (- lambda _ k * u) * differential-d@(u)))
absent = ((sum _ (k = 1)) ^ infinity)@(((integral _ 0) ^ infinity)@(u ^ (s - 1) * e ^ (- lambda _ k * u) * differential-d@(u)))

para.p: Thus

Math.text: zeta _ A * s = (1 / (Gamma * s)) * ((integral _ 0) ^ infinity)@(u ^ (s - 1) * ((sum _ (k = 1)) ^ infinity)@(e ^ (- lambda _ k * u) * d * u))

para.p:
For
> γ 0
, the eigenvalues of
⁢ γ A
are
⁢ γ
λ k
, and doing the change of variables
= v
⁢ γ u
,

Math.text: zeta _ (gamma * A) * s = (1 / (Gamma * s)) * ((integral _ 0) ^ infinity)@(u ^ (s - 1) * ((sum _ (k = 1)) ^ infinity)@(e ^ (- gamma * lambda _ k * u) * d * u))
zeta _ (gamma * A) * s
absent = (1 / (Gamma * s)) * ((integral _ 0) ^ infinity)@(u ^ (s - 1) * ((sum _ (k = 1)) ^ infinity)@(e ^ (- gamma * lambda _ k * u) * d * u))
absent = (1 / (Gamma * s)) * ((integral _ 0) ^ infinity)@(gamma ^ (- s) * v ^ (s - 1) * ((sum _ (k = 1)) ^ infinity)@(e ^ (- lambda _ k * v) * d * v))
absent = (1 / (Gamma * s)) * ((integral _ 0) ^ infinity)@(gamma ^ (- s) * v ^ (s - 1) * ((sum _ (k = 1)) ^ infinity)@(e ^ (- lambda _ k * v) * d * v))
absent = gamma ^ (- s) * zeta _ A * s
absent = gamma ^ (- s) * zeta _ A * s

para.p: Taking the derivative,

Math.text: (zeta _ (gamma * A)) ^ prime * s = (- logarithm@(gamma cdot gamma ^ (- s) cdot zeta _ A) * s) + gamma ^ (- s) * (gamma _ A) ^ prime * s

para.p: and then

Math.text: (zeta _ (gamma * A)) ^ prime * 0 = (- logarithm@(gamma cdot zeta _ A) * 0) + (zeta _ A) ^ prime * 0

para.p: Then

Math.text: determinant@(gamma * A) = e ^ (- (zeta _ (gamma * A)) ^ prime * 0) = e ^ (logarithm@(gamma cdot zeta _ A) * 0 - (zeta _ A) ^ prime * 0) = gamma ^ (zeta _ A * 0) * determinant@(A)
